interestingcomments.content:
Smart PCB beer mats /!/ Last weekend I made some PCB beer mats for our office @ [Autonoma](https://www.linkedin.com/company/autonoma-iot/).

Special  feature: energy harvesting NFC chip, which can hold specific  information. On each beer mat you can upload e.g. your contact  information, website or also your wallet address for tips, which can be  easily opened with your smartphone. 🎉

Fun  fact: When placing the unused components you have a fully functional  ESP32 board with 2 user buttons and 3 LEDs, which can be connected to a cloud.  
Possible use cases: Track  your time, Free/Busy/do not interrupt  indication for your colleagues,  ...

&#x200B;

What would you do with it?  
Any improvements for version 2?

Cheers!

![video](qpyweovlls771)
